lead_paragraph: The 64-board final of the World Junior Team Championship for the Ortiz-Patiño Trophy in Philadelphia last month was between France and Israel.
snippet: The 64-board final of the World Junior Team Championship for the Ortiz-Patiño Trophy in Philadelphia last month was between France and Israel.

headline.main: Going Down to the Last Board at the World Junior Teams
headline.print_headline: Going Down to the Last Board At the World Junior Teams
